briefTitle: Effectiveness of an Electronic Training Program for Orienting and Interpreting [18F]Flutemetamol Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Images
officialTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness of an Electronic Training Program for Orienting and Interpreting [18F]Flutemetamol Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Images.
summary: To Evaluate the Effectiveness of an Electronic Training Program for Orienting and Interpreting \[18F\]flutemetamol Positron Emission Tomography (PET) Images.

primaryOutcome.measure: Summary of Sensitivity of the Blinded Visual PET Image Interpretations Without Anatomic Images.
